mapper.select: WITH b AS (SELECT board.id AS "id", title, hit, g_no, depth, user_id, DATE_FORMAT(board.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS reg_date_formatted, name AS "username", o_no, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board) - (ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY board.g_no DESC, board.o_no) - 1) AS board_index FROM board LEFT JOIN webdb.user u ON board.user_id = u.id ORDER BY g_no DESC, o_no) SELECT id, title, hit, depth, reg_date_formatted AS "regDate", user_id AS "userId", username, board_index AS "index" FROM b WHERE title LIKE #{query} ORDER BY g_no DESC, o_no LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
SELECT board.id, title, u.id AS "userId", u.name AS "username", contents, g_no AS "groupNo", depth, o_no AS "orderNo" FROM board LEFT JOIN webdb.user u ON board.user_id = u.id WHERE board.id = #{id};
